alpha-kappa.mil-dollars: Pay off the house, Invest, Travel
alpha-kappa.advice: RUSH LAMBDAS and friends are super super important more than anything.
alpha-kappa.why-join: Everyone is accepting and encouraging of being unique and different from one another.
alpha-kappa.name: Hudson "Havoc" Tan
alpha-kappa.bio: Hudson was born in Long Beach, CA. I grew up an extremely shy kid until sometime in highschool where pretty much all I did was school or basketball. I joined Lambdas to be a part of a supportive, close knit community and to also have the best possible social experiences during my college years. My hobbies include playing basketball, playing guitar, thrifting, and being a foodie. So, if you are ever in SoCal and in need of a list of food recommendations, I got you.

alpha-kappa.mil-dollars: Give it all to my parents.
alpha-kappa.fun-fact: I forget things as soon as I learn it.
alpha-kappa.why-join: To grow out of my past self.
alpha-kappa.name: Vinson "Azure" Feng
alpha-kappa.bio: Vinson was born in Brooklyn, New York, where he spent most of his life prior to coming to Ithaca. Whenever he isn’t spending time with friends and family, you can expect that he’s either sleeping, listening to music, or wasting money on non-dining hall food. His hobbies include fashion, swimming, working out, and trying to learn how to cook.

alpha-kappa.mil-dollars: Use the money to make more money
alpha-kappa.fun-fact: I used to be allergic to every kind of melon.
alpha-kappa.why-join: To build bonds beyond traditional friendships and be a part of something bigger
alpha-kappa.name: Kelvin "Altair" Chen
alpha-kappa.bio: Kelvin was born in Singapore, but moved to the United States when he was only four years old. He has lived in New Jersey ever since, where he enjoyed playing golf and volunteering. Kelvin also served two years in the Singaporean army prior to college, achieving the rank of lieutenant. Outside of class, Kelvin is a volunteer firefighter and spends time training and responding to emergencies. When he’s not in class or fighting fires, he is often just chilling or eating, and he’s often free to meet up anywhere. Hit him up anytime you want to talk about the military, firefighting, or literally anything as he’s got a lot of stories to share.

alpha-kappa.fav-quote: "Real g move in silence like lasagna - Lil Wayne"
alpha-kappa.mil-dollars: Use 1% on poker and the rest on buying Tesla options, give half of the gains to my parents afterwards
alpha-kappa.fun-fact: I can finish a whole meal in 10.5 seconds
alpha-kappa.advice: Nothing is inherently bad or good, something bad in the present could lead you to good things in the future
alpha-kappa.why-join: To meet people and build long lasting friendships that last a lifetime
alpha-kappa.name: Jacky "Odyssey" Jin
alpha-kappa.bio: Jacky was born in Zhejiang, China, but moved to Hong Kong when he was thirteen years old. He has lived in Hong Kong ever since, where he enjoyed playing basketball and poker. When he is not studying at Uris stacks, you can often see him sleeping, chilling with his friends in his apartment, or exploring Ithaca. Hit him up if you need someone to eat with as he’s always down for some good food.

alpha-kappa.fav-quote: "Swimming Butterfly Is Like Having Sex On A Waterbed- A Friend Of My Swim Coach"
alpha-kappa.mil-dollars: I would give most to my parents and invest the rest.
alpha-kappa.advice: It’s not about how fast you get it done, it’s about getting it done.
alpha-kappa.why-join: For brothers who I know will constantly support and push me to the best I can be.
alpha-kappa.name: Jason "Sentinel" Zheng
alpha-kappa.bio: Jason is from Wantagh, NY and is majoring in Biological Engineering. He swam in high school but has now transitioned more into the gym life. You can often find his face stuck in his homework in Olin Library or whatever little nook he can find. In his free time, he likes to skate around campus, play his uke, or stuff his face with tons of food. Feel free to hit him up if you ever need a dope buddy to chill with.

alpha-iota.mil-dollars: I would invest and give the rest to my parents.
alpha-iota.name: Sam "Vega" Jegal

alpha-iota.fun-fact: I get my body hair plucked.
alpha-iota.advice: Don’t feel like you need to impress others.
alpha-iota.name: Jason "Evo" Tung

alpha-iota.fav-quote: "Experience doesn’t always mean you have all the right answers" - my swim coach or something
alpha-iota.mil-dollars: Give back to my parents, invest, and travel.
alpha-iota.fun-fact: Before I tried hockey, I figure skated. I quit because I thought I would get cooties :(
alpha-iota.advice: Try stepping out of your comfort zone! You only get to experience college once so make the most of it :)
alpha-iota.why-join: To meet new people and step out of my comfort zone. To form lifelong connections and create memorable experiences that I knew I wouldn’t regret.
alpha-iota.name: Eddie "Ricasso" Chi

alpha-iota.fav-quote: "Don't ask yourself what the world needs. Ask yourself what makes you come alive, and go do that, because what the world needs is people who have come alive." -Howard Thurman
alpha-iota.mil-dollars: Would give 800k to my dad to invest and travel the world with the rest.
alpha-iota.advice: Don't be afraid to step outside your comfort zone because college is a time to grow.
alpha-iota.why-join: Someone had to be the scapegoat of the class.
alpha-iota.name: Ryan "Point Blank" Wong

alpha-theta.fav-quote: "A ship in harbor is safe — but that is not what ships are built for." - John A. Shedd
alpha-theta.mil-dollars: I would buy VIP tickets to the next Twice concert and invest the rest.
alpha-theta.fun-fact: I personally know Tadashi Yanai, the CEO of Uniqlo (richest man in Japan!!) and have a picture with him that I flex a lot.
alpha-theta.advice: Don't be scared to give people the benefit of the doubt.
alpha-theta.why-join: To push myself to my limits and become a changed person.
alpha-theta.name: Kazuya "Drift" Chue
alpha-theta.bio: Kazuya is from Herndon, Virginia and grew up in Fairfax County. He is a student in the College of Engineering majoring in Computer Science. In college, Kazuya is still trying to stay fit by going to the gym, but he will never again touch a rowing machine. During 12am - 3am, you can probably find Kazuya in his room grinding towards his professional esports career. Feel free to hit him up if you play CS:GO, listen to Japanese music, or follow the NFL and NBA!

alpha-theta.mil-dollars: I would give half to my parents and invest the other half.
alpha-theta.fun-fact: I was hit by a car on April fools day
alpha-theta.advice: Take every opportunity to meet friends (rush lambdas)
alpha-theta.why-join: To socially challenge myself through brotherhood and for lasting memories and friendships.
alpha-theta.name: Alden "Carbon" Choe
alpha-theta.bio: Born in Honolulu, Hawaii raised in California. Spends most of his time in the studio pulling frequent overnighters. On his free time, enjoys sleeping, eating, bowling and spending hours on his fashion statement. As a Cornell Tradition Fellow, spends many weekends volunteering and engaging with the community. Don't be fooled by stature, this boys always down for a good arm wrestle battle. Lifelong goal is to gain weight. If you ever need a foodie buddy, HMU!

alpha-theta.fav-quote: “Once my acne is gone, it’s over” - Kevin Park
alpha-theta.fun-fact: I dyed my hair blonde in high school because I lost a FIFA bet.
alpha-theta.advice: Make the best out of resources the school provides. Don’t try to handle everything on your own.
alpha-theta.name: Akimasa "Saros" Ihara
alpha-theta.bio: Akimasa was born and raised in Singapore but is Japanese. He enjoys playing soccer and is part of the club team here at Cornell (it pains him to call the sport soccer instead of football). He is an aspiring astronaut and hopes to be working at NASA in 10 years. Some of his hobbies include snowboarding, rock climbing, watching anime and playing the violin. If you're into any of these things hit him up!

alpha-theta.mil-dollars: Give half to parents and invest the other half.
alpha-theta.fun-fact: I used to be decently intelligent before college.
alpha-theta.why-join: To find a supportive and caring community that I can call my family.
alpha-theta.name: Jongwan "Argo" Kim
alpha-theta.bio: Jongwan is from Seoul, South Korea. Although he attended high school in the United States, he has lived mostly in Japan, which explains his occasional English deficiencies. He is currently a student in the College of Engineering studying Computer Science and Applied Mathematics. While he's not sleeping or studying, you can often find him playing basketball, lifting weights, eating unhealthy things or being incredibly dumb with the boys. Feel free to hit him up if you want to get sauce him in basketball.

alpha-theta.mil-dollars: I'd pay off my college tuition and give the rest to my parents.
alpha-theta.fun-fact: I played basketball overseas in Europe.
alpha-theta.advice: Make meaningful relationships as they are the most important part of your growth as an individual in and outside of college.
alpha-theta.why-join: So I could put "ΛΦΕ" in my Instagram bio.
alpha-theta.name: Kevin "Vision" Park
alpha-theta.bio: Kevin is from Salt Lake City, UT. Kevin enjoys spending his time watching tiktok, working out, and watching Kdramas. Although he is Korean, he is trying to find somebody to help teach him speak the language, so if you are that person hit him up! Be warned, despite being the smartest bro in the house, hanging out with him too long could lower your IQ. So if you enjoy any of these things, please hit him up as he is a simp. P.S. He likes being called Oppa.

alpha-theta.mil-dollars: I would blow it on way too much coffee.
alpha-theta.advice: Spend time finding things you are passionate about and creating experiences and memories that you would love to remember.
alpha-theta.name: Rishabh "Paladin" Sarup
alpha-theta.bio: Rishabh is from Singapore, but now lives in Hong Kong. When he's not finishing an assignment in the Olin stacks the day it's due or working in the Project Team lab, you can find him exploring food options in Ithaca, chilling with friends, or making new Spotify playlists. If you ever want to play pool, poker or just hang out, feel free to hit him up!

alpha-theta.fav-quote: "I'm sick and tired of being sick and tired"
alpha-theta.mil-dollars: I would give some to my parents and invest the rest
alpha-theta.fun-fact: I'm left-handed but my parents made me do everything with my right
alpha-theta.advice: When the opportunity is right there in front of you, take it.
alpha-theta.why-join: To join a brotherhood that would define my time in college.
alpha-theta.name: James "Kaiser" Liang
alpha-theta.bio: James was born in Boston, Massachusetts and moved to Washington at a young age. Growing up, James learned the piano and it eventually became one of his favorite pastimes. Some of his most memorable moments were from performances in places such as the Seattle Public Library. In his free time, he enjoys hiking the many trails in Washington, practicing lucid dreaming, or just hanging out with friends.

alpha-theta.fav-quote: “You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.” — Mae West
alpha-theta.mil-dollars: Invest in real estate so my parents can retire.
alpha-theta.advice: Always be willing to go out to look for new things because sometimes a leap of faith is all it takes to change your life.
alpha-theta.why-join: For the brotherhood and people I will meet.
alpha-theta.name: Richard "Concord" Lin
alpha-theta.bio: Richard is an ORIE from Staten Island, New York. You can always find him in the Uris Cocktail Lounge or Olin Library sleeping on any free space he can find. When he is awake he insists on staying in the library because it makes him feel productive, but you will almost never find him doing work. In his free time he likes to play volleyball, binging shows and YouTube, and watching TikTok with boys. Hit him up if you need someone down-to-earth when everyone else is busy studying!

alpha-theta.fav-quote: "Trends come and go, but cool is forever." - Kanye West
alpha-theta.mil-dollars: I'd buy a few cars and a house for my parents then invest the rest.
alpha-theta.fun-fact: I streaked at my high school homecoming game
alpha-theta.advice: Find a balance between school and socials.
alpha-theta.why-join: I wanted to join a community that would support everyone involved.
alpha-theta.name: David "Helios" Cheng
alpha-theta.bio: David is a local Ithacan who was born and raised right next to Cornell. Once he graduates, David hopes to move to a city and get out of this small town. He hopes to transfer to the Dyson School of Business to study entrepreneurship. Outside of class, you can find David sleeping in a library, working out or watching obscure videos on YouTube. He also enjoys procrastinating in his dorm room by watching JoJo's Bizarre Adventure or playing video games on his outdated PC.

alpha-eta.mil-dollars: Start an annuity for my mum
alpha-eta.fun-fact: I was voted funniest person in my middle school yearbook
alpha-eta.advice: Accumulate as many unique experiences as you can
alpha-eta.name: Ronald "Sentry" Chan
alpha-eta.bio: Ronald is from Brooklyn, NY. He is a member of the Cornell Boxing Club. When he's not pretending to do work, you can catch him cooking, reading, or hanging out with friends. Hit him up anytime you need a monkey to say dumb shit to brighten up your day.

alpha-eta.fav-quote: "It ain’t over till it’s over" -Yogi Berra
alpha-eta.mil-dollars: Cop a nice house for the fam, throw the rest at SPY.
alpha-eta.fun-fact: I'm allergic to eggs but can make a decent omelette.
alpha-eta.advice: Spend your time here wisely, four years isn’t all that much.
alpha-eta.why-join: To get to know some awesome dudes.
alpha-eta.name: Daniel "Resonance" Zhan
alpha-eta.bio: Dan is from Edison, NJ. On campus, you can find him playing badminton with the Cornell team, working on the Cornell Mars Rover, and doing cardio at the gym. He also plays the electric bass sometimes and loves a good game of Civ V. Hit him up if you want to play badminton or hang out!

alpha-zeta.fav-quote: "The only easy day was yesterday" - Navy SEALS
alpha-zeta.mil-dollars: I'd pay my parents bills, and use some to buy clothes and travel
alpha-zeta.fun-fact: People have a hard time understanding his slang
alpha-zeta.advice: RUSH LAMBDAS and don't stress about not knowing what you want to do in life.
alpha-zeta.why-join: For regular people Saturday's are for the boys. For Lambdas EVERYDAY IS FOR THE BOYS.
alpha-zeta.name: Victor "Cypher" Minh
alpha-zeta.bio: Victor was born in Hanoi, Vietnam. He moved to New York City when we was four months old and has lived there ever since. He used to Wrestle and play Lacrosse in high school but now all he does is lift. When he's not doing work you can find him being a degen, chilling with the boys, and trying to help Orion lower his Rice Purity score. He's a fan of rap, EDM, raving, cars, and good munchies. Hit him up anytime if you're trying to go to any type of rap festival/rave or if you're trying to go clubbing.

alpha-zeta.fav-quote: "You got a friend in me." - Toy Story
alpha-zeta.advice: Manage your time properly and keep your priorities straight.
alpha-zeta.why-join: I joined to find a group of strong and determined individuals, like myself.
alpha-zeta.name: Kevin "Surge" Chen
alpha-zeta.bio: Kevin is from Queens, New York. When he is not studying very hard, he is playing video games with his friends, mainly CS:GO. He enjoys listening to rap and occasionally EDM. Food is a great motivator for him, especially fried rice. One day, he hopes to be an astronaut, specifically the first man on Mars. If you're looking for someone to eat with or talk to, please hit him up.

alpha-zeta.major: Computer Science, Economics, and Information Science
alpha-zeta.fav-quote: “The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain!”
alpha-zeta.mil-dollars: Pay off my student debt and invest the rest.
alpha-zeta.advice: Find your place in college, surround yourself with people that care, and never stop giving your 110%.
alpha-zeta.why-join: I made most of my closest friends in the military and the brotherhood I have found here is irreplaceable. Likewise, joining Lambdas has become a home away from home for me.
alpha-zeta.name: Samuel "Orion" Lye
alpha-zeta.bio: Before college, Samuel served in the Singapore Armed Forces for 2 years. On campus, Samuel has been involved in Cornell Venture Capital and Cornell Cup Robotics. In his free time, Samuel enjoys running, hitting the gym, cooking/baking, and photography. He enjoys a wide variety of music - mandopop, kpop, edm, and just regular chill music so feel free to ask for music recommendations. As the house's best Halo player, hit him up if you ever think you are good at Halo (his little can attest!)

alpha-zeta.fav-quote: "Stop worrying so much and start having fun!" - My high school English teacher
alpha-zeta.mil-dollars: Buy my dog a lot of treats. Buy a lot of bubble tea. Become the greatest Pokémon trainer of all time.
alpha-zeta.fun-fact: I have a Tibetan Mastiff that weighs almost as much as me.
alpha-zeta.advice: Make sure you study but don't let it get in the way of new experiences.
alpha-zeta.why-join: To find people I can be dumb with.
alpha-zeta.name: Matt "Stratos" Zhao
alpha-zeta.bio: Matt is from Potomac, Maryland and is currently a student in the Dyson school studying Finance and Marketing. Outside the classroom, he's usually at practice for the Cornell Club Volleyball team or wasting time not doing homework. Besides that, you can probably find him at Kung Fu Tea or messing around with his friends. If you have any really bad jokes, want to hear his awful singing, or just want to procrastinate, let him know!

alpha-zeta.fav-quote: "You have to think anyway, so why not think big? - Donald J. Trump
alpha-zeta.mil-dollars: Court-side seats at the NBA finals
alpha-zeta.fun-fact: I know the names of every country in the world
alpha-zeta.advice: Put time into the people you really care about. Don't get caught into thinking you have to be friends with someone just because it is convenient.
alpha-zeta.why-join: I wanted a family that would always push each other to their fullest abilities. Also the boyssssss
alpha-zeta.name: Simon "Apex" Liu
alpha-zeta.bio: Simon is from Vancouver, Canada. He is a student in the College of Arts and Sciences, studying Economics and French. When he's not desperately trying to stay awake by chugging coconut milk caramel macchiatos, you can find him pretending to speak French or confusing people by describing the temperature in celsius. In his free time, Simon is often spotted violating gym law by doing curls in the squat rack. Hit him up if you see can yourself doing any of these things.

alpha-zeta.fav-quote: "Why waste time use lot word when few word do trick?" - Kevin Malone
alpha-zeta.advice: Enjoy your time in college while it lasts or something
alpha-zeta.why-join: For the sense of brotherhood and to develop lasting relationships socially and professionally
alpha-zeta.name: Naotaka "Enigma" Kinoshita
alpha-zeta.bio: Despite his name, Naotaka was born and raised in NYC. He's a big fan of cars and fashion, so hit him up if you want to talk about either of those, especially Japanese cars or Japanese fashion. In the future, he hopes to put his hobby of cars to use by actually getting a license and being able to drive. In his free time, he likes to sit around and watch YouTube and play CS:GO.

alpha-delta.major: Physics and Economics, M.Eng in Financial Engineering
alpha-delta.fav-quote: "I tried to pay attention but attention paid me" -Lil Wayne
alpha-delta.mil-dollars: I'd probably forget where I put it and go ape shit looking for it.
alpha-delta.fun-fact: I'm deaf in one ear but I can hear bullshit from a mile away.
alpha-delta.advice: Rush Lambdas. Also don't skip class too much. Unless you want to.
alpha-delta.name: Kylan "Spartan" Lim-Hanna
alpha-delta.bio: I was born and raised in Southern California where I learned how to be a goon. I'm actually Chinese and Arabic, not a random Latino guy. I like spending time with the guys and lifting, which is way better than going to class. At any given time I'm probably doing dumb shit with the Alpha Deltas, eating way too much, or sleeping in way later than I should be. Feel free to hit me up to hang out any time or if you tryna get big!
